arts.ttl: Tottenham predicted lineup vs Monaco: Frank breaks up dreary midfield
arts.sum: The Spurs boss must make a midfield change for Wednesday's Champions League clash.

arts.ttl: Two Spurs players absent from training before Monaco UCL clash
arts.sum: Tottenham Hotspur will travel to France to face Monaco in the Champions League, and Thomas Frank could reportedly be without three players.

arts.ttl: Monaco vs Tottenham preview: Dier injured for Spurs reunion with Pogba out
arts.sum: Asked by Sky Sports News whether Dier was disappointed to miss out on facing his old club, new Monaco boss Sebastien Pocognoli replied: "Actually, it was more general disappointment to be injured because I felt he really wanted to start the journey with me on the weekend. Tottenham will not be reunited with Eric Dier, with the Monaco defender injured for Wednesday's Champions League clash in France.

arts.ttl: Monaco vs Tottenham predictions: Depleted Spurs could taste defeat
arts.sum: Monaco face Tottenham in the Champions League on Wednesday and Dan Childs foresees a first win of the competition for the Ligue 1 side.

arts.ttl: AS Monaco v Tottenham: ‘Mountain of injuries’ drama ahead of Champions League clash
arts.sum: AS Monaco are facing a ‘mountain of injuries’ ahead of taking on Tottenham Hotspur in the Champions League this week. That’s according to Made in Monegasque, who cover the struggles manager Sébastien Pocognoli is facing ahead of the clash with Tottenham. The Ligue 1 side host Thomas Frank’s side on match-day three on Wednesday. arts.ttl: Cristian Romero and Destiny Udogie sit out Tottenham training before Monaco trip
arts.sum: Spurs captain Romero pulled out in the warm-up of Sunday’s 2-1 loss to Aston Villa with an adductor issue.

arts.ttl: How Frank can make Champions League history for Spurs in Monaco clash
arts.sum: Tottenham Hotspur head coach Thomas Frank could create Champions League history for the Lilywhites when they face Monaco in Wednesday's league-phase battle.
